    @Deprecated(since="2021-05-27")
public class LazyDBDecoder
extends LazyBSONDecoder
implements DBDecoder
    Deprecated.
    Usage of this API is not supported in AEM as a Cloud Service.
    A decoder for LazyDBObject instances.
